S

send(Object) - Method in class chat_room.Connection
Sends a message
sendToAll(Object) - Method in class chat_room.server.AllClientsMaintainer
Sends a message to all participants in the chat room
sendToAllButOne(Object, String) - Method in class chat_room.server.AllClientsMaintainer
Sending a message to everyone in the chat room except one
Server - Class in chat_room.server
Accepts clients to the chat room and creates a singleClientHandler for each in order to read messages from each one and then broadcast to all clients in the chat room
Server(ExecutorService) - Constructor for class chat_room.server.Server
Create a new server
SERVER_TERMINATE - Static variable in class chat_room.server.Server
A signal saying this server has terminated
setIsClosed(boolean) - Method in class chat_room.client.Client
Sets the status of the connection to this client
setIsConnected(boolean) - Method in class chat_room.server.Server
Sets the connection status of this server
setMaxParticipantsAmount(int) - Method in class chat_room.server.Server
Sets the maximum of participants allowed
setMyName(String) - Method in class chat_room.Connection
Sets this connection's name
SingleClientHandler - Class in chat_room.server
Created by the server.
SingleClientHandler(Connection, AllClientsMaintainer) - Constructor for class chat_room.server.SingleClientHandler
